name: The City of Intrigues
description:
A game project for this course:

Dip. of Screen and Media (Interactive Media) 2018 RMIT University

I would recommend that you play this game on desktop since it may look broken on the phone.  Also, zoom out your browser since by clicking the 'three vertical dots' icon and on the word 'Zoom' click '-' the minus button. (Google Chrome) 

The exit button on the main menu can't work on this. But it does work if you have the game files (I can't let you download it, sorry).
